title: Radio Flyer font?
content: Anyone know the name of the font from the Radio Flyer logo (see attached). Would love to find a free version of it. Doesn't have to be exact, just close. ![Radio Flyer logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20111230085320im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70891.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content: [Alexandria](http://web.archive.org/web/20111230085320/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=alexandria&text=RADIO+FLYER) by Hank Gillette at DaFont is similar and free. That may meet your criteria.
They might have started with Citadel from Font Bureau, hmmm ...
But that A looks kinda familiar
